no.uit.ods.beaconme

Class Beacon

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.uit.ods.beaconme.Beacon

  • public class Beacon
extends java.lang.Object
    Author: Espen MÃ¦land Wilhelmsen, espen.wilhelmsen@gmail.com This class implements beacon. It holds the information about the beacon which is accessed through the bundled methods. The beacon have a variable threshold which is used to delay the beacon from being removed the beacon list to prevent beacons from beeing prematurly removed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Beacon

        public Beacon(BluetoothDevice device,
              int signal,
              byte[] sRecord)
        Constructor method. Requires a BluetoothDevice class item, a signal strength (RSSI) and a scanRecord which is bundled with the leScan method of the BluetoothAdapter. (It's the beacon's broadcast packet in raw form).
        Parameters:
        device - BluetoothDevice from the Android standard library
        signal - Integer that represents the signal level in dBm
        sRecord - The raw data from the BTLE scan, contains all info from the beacon

      • putRssi

        public void putRssi(int strength)
        Updates the RSSI variable inside the Beacon class with a new signal strength.
        Parameters:
        strength - The new RSSI of the beacon.

      • getAddress

        public java.lang.String getAddress()
        Returns the ID (MAC address) of the beacon.
        Returns:
        a String in xx:yy:xx:yy:xx:yy format with the mac address of the beacon.

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance()
        Gets the estimated distance from the beacon based on the beacons advertised signal level at 1m and the rssi registered on the device.
        Returns:
        A double with the distance from beacon in meters.

      • getThreshold

        public int getThreshold()
        Returns the value of the threshold variable from the beacon class.
